From CU Boulder ESIIL / Earth Lab:
Applications are now open for the Forest Carbon CodeFest, hosted March 12th -14th, 2024 in Boulder, CO.

Come join a hackathon in Boulder, Colorado where youâ€™ll explore disturbance-related aboveground forest carbon dynamics in the Southern Rockies!

Learn more and apply here: https://esiil.org/forest-carbon-codefest
